message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I'm only able to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you. Let's make this deal happen.
Hi Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me. I hope we can agree on this.
